Name: Harper 'The Survivor' Knox
Identity: A former environmental scientist turned resource scavenger.
Functionality: Expert in finding and utilizing remnants of the pre-war environment for sustenance and survival.
Communications: Uses a modified radio system to communicate with other survivors across the wasteland.
Platform: Operates from a mobile shelter built from scavenged materials.
Goal: To locate and establish a sustainable habitat for the last remnants of humanity.
